inputs.note:
Patient: Kwesi Appiah
DOB: 12/05/1975 | MRN: MRN-3301

Subjective: 51M presents for chronic low back pain follow-up. Reports pain 8/10, radiating to left leg. Current regimen inadequate. Reports significant anxiety and insomnia.

PMH: Chronic lumbar radiculopathy (L4-L5 disc herniation), Generalized Anxiety Disorder, Insomnia
Allergies: Codeine (nausea)

Objective:
  Vitals: BP 130/82, HR 70, Temp 37.0°C
  Neuro: Decreased sensation L5 dermatome left, weakness in left EHL 4/5
  Straight leg raise: Positive at 40° left

Assessment: Chronic lumbar radiculopathy with neuropathic pain

Plan: Continue OxyContin 20mg BID. Add Xanax 0.5mg TID for anxiety. Gabapentin 300mg TID for neuropathic pain. MRI lumbar spine ordered. Neurosurgery referral.
inputs.labs:
CBC: WNL
BMP: WNL
Urine Drug Screen: Positive for oxycodone (expected)
LFTs: AST 28, ALT 32 (normal)
inputs.meds:
OxyContin 20mg PO BID
Xanax 0.5mg PO TID
Gabapentin 300mg PO TID
Ibuprofen 400mg PO PRN
Trazodone 50mg PO QHS PRN
